import axios from'axios';export const BASE_URL='https://localhost:7206';export const ENDPOINTS={question:'question',getAnswers:'question/getanswers'};export const createAPIEndpoint=endpoint=>{let url="".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/").concat(endpoint,"/");// Added a forward slash ("/") after BASE_URL
return{fetch:()=>axios.get(url),fetchById:id=>axios.get(url+id),post:newRecord=>axios.post(url,newRecord),put:(id,updatedRecord)=>axios.put(url+id,updatedRecord),delete:id=>axios.delete(url+id)};};
